job.title: REMOTE Imaging Research Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Research Scientist with imaging experience, please read on!
Based in Newark, CA, we are a top defense and screening technology company with a broad global presence. Our unique and innovative company ensures continued safety and support is provided for our clients' staff and systems, as well as the general public. Due to growth and demand for our services, we are in need of a talented Research Scientist to join our diverse team and help us continue to drive success for many years to come!
What You Will Be Doing
Work within our team on algorithm development and system characterization for our systems
Use existing tools and software to perform experiments pertaining to system design and analysis
Help to enhance existing software modules
Design prototypes and test new algorithms
Report findings to broad audience, both technical and non-technical personnel
Work cross-organizationally with multiple teams and individuals
What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's degree, Master's degree, or greater in Physics, Applied Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or similar
2+ years of experience in implementing algorithms using C++
Experience with image or signal processing
Comfortable working in a Linux environment
Nice To Haves
Experience with CUDA & GPU programming
Experience with forward projectors & ray tracing
Experience with x-ray physics, CT image generation, Fourier analysis, signal processing, stochastic processes, or image quality
Experience with image processing toolkits / libraries like. Matlab, VTK, ITK, or similar
What's In It for You
Competitive base salary
Annual incentive bonus plan
Health benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)
PTO
401(K)
Flexible hours
Work/life balance
Tuition assistance
Paid maternity/paternity leave
Growth Opportunities
Amazing internal culture/team!
So if this sounds like you and you're looking to grow with an incredible organization, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
